description: [Moneybird](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1137) is associated with ransomware operations launched by [Agrius](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1030).(Citation: CheckPoint Agrius 2023)

external_references.description: Marc  Salinas Fernandez & Jiri  Vinopal. (2023, May 23). AGRIUS DEPLOYS MONEYBIRD IN TARGETED ATTACKS AGAINST ISRAELI ORGANIZATIONS. Retrieved May 21, 2024.
